00049 // statics 
00050 
00051 std::pair<DbCore::seq_iter, DbCore::seq_iter> 
00052 DbCore::find_after(EUROPA::TimelineId const &tl, TICK now) {
00053   sequence_type const &seq = tl->getTokenSequence();
00054   seq_iter i = seq.begin(), last = seq.end();
00055 
00056   for(; last!=i && (*i)->end()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()<=now; ++i);
00057   return  std::make_pair(i, last);
00058 }

00062 
00063 DbCore::DbCore(EuropaReactor &owner)
00064   :EUROPA::PlanDatabaseListener(owner.assembly().plan_db()),
00065    m_reactor(owner) {}
00066 
00067 DbCore::~DbCore() {}

00070 
00071 void DbCore::initialize(EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId const &clk) {
00072   TICK initial = m_reactor.getInitialTick();
00073   m_clk = clk;
00074 
00075   EUROPA::TokenSet const &all = m_reactor.assembly().plan_db()->getTokens();  
00076   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain mission_scope(initial, m_reactor.getFinalTick()),
00077     end_scope(initial+1, PLUS_INFINITY);
00078 
00079   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=all.begin(); all.end()!=i; ++i) {
00080     if( (*i)->isFact() ) {
00081       // First check that the fact applies to a single object
00082       if( !(*i)->getObject()->baseDomain().isSingleton() ) 
00083        throw TokenError(**i, "Facts should be associated to a single object"); 
00084 
00085       // extract the object
00086       EUROPA::ObjectDomain const &domain=(*i)->getObject()->baseDomain();
00087       EUROPA::ObjectId object = domain.getObject(domain.getSingletonValue());
00088 
00089       // check that he object is not en external timeline
00090       if( m_reactor.assembly().isExternal(object) ) 
00091        throw TokenError(**i, "Facts cannot be applied to external timelines");
00092 
00093       // OK now should I ignore this fact 
00094       if( m_reactor.assembly().isIgnored(object) ) {
00095        m_reactor.log("WARN")<<"Ignoring the fact "<<object->toString()
00096                           <<'.'<<(*i)->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString()
00097                           <<" as its object is on the Ignore list.";
00098        m_reactor.assembly().ignore(*i);
00099       } else {
00100        if( (*i)->start()->baseDomain().getLowerBound() > mission_scope.getUpperBound() 
00101            || (*i)->end()->baseDomain().getUpperBound() < end_scope.getLowerBound() ) {
00102          m_reactor.log("WARN")<<"Ignoring the fact "<<object->toString()
00103                             <<'.'<<(*i)->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString()
00104                             <<" as it is outside of mission scope";
00105          m_reactor.assembly().ignore(*i);
00106        } else {
00107          EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain start_bounds(mission_scope), 
00108            end_bounds(end_scope);
00109          start_bounds.intersect((*i)->start()->baseDomain());
00110          end_bounds.intersect((*i)->end()->baseDomain());
00111          if( !start_bounds.isEmpty() ) {
00112            (*i)->start()->restrictBaseDomain(start_bounds);
00113            // (*i)->start()->handleBase(start_bounds);
00114          }
00115          if( !end_bounds.isEmpty() ) {
00116            (*i)->end()->restrictBaseDomain(end_bounds);
00117            // (*i)->start()->handleBase(end_bounds);
00118          }
00119          enforce_duration(*i);
00120          (*i)->activate();
00121          object->constrain(*i, *i);
00122        }
00123       }
00124     }
00125   }
00126 }

00128 void DbCore::set_internal(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj) {
00129   m_internals.insert(std::make_pair(obj, EUROPA::TokenId::noId()));
00130 }
00131 
00132 void DbCore::set_external(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj) {
00133   m_externals.insert(std::make_pair(obj, EUROPA::TokenId::noId()));
00134 }
00135 
00136 void DbCore::notify(state_map::value_type const &obs) {
00137   std::pair<state_map::iterator, bool> ret = m_new_obs.insert(obs);
00138   if( !ret.second ) {
00139     if( ret.first->second.isId() ) {
00140       m_reactor.log("WARN")<<"Multiple observations received on "
00141                         <<obs.first->toString()
00142                         <<"\n discard "<<ret.first->second->toString()
00143                         <<"\n replace by "<<obs.second->toString();
00144       // Only the last observation count
00145       ret.first->second->discard();
00146     }
00147     ret.first->second = obs.second;
00148   }
00149   debugMsg("trex:token", '['<<m_reactor.getCurrentTick()
00150           <<"] OBSERVATION "<<obs.first->toString()
00151           <<'.'<<obs.second->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString());
00152   m_observations.insert(obs.second);
00153 }
00154 
00155 bool DbCore::update_externals() {
00156   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00157   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain now(cur, cur), future(cur+1, PLUS_INFINITY);
00158   state_map::iterator i = m_externals.begin();
00159   Assembly &assembly = m_reactor.assembly();
00160 
00161   // Integrate new observations and apply inertial value assumption
00162   for( ; m_externals.end()!=i; ++i) {
00163     state_map::iterator ni = m_new_obs.find(i->first);
00164     debugMsg("trex:sync", " Update external "<<i->first->toString());
00165     if( m_new_obs.end()!=ni ) {
00166       EUROPA::TokenId obs = ni->second,
00167        previous = i->second;
00168       debugMsg("trex:sync", "New observation : "
00169               <<obs->toString());
00170       
00171       // terminate previous observation
00172       if( previous.isId() ) {
00173        previous->end()->restrictBaseDomain(now); 
00174        // previous->end()->handleBase(now);
00175        enforce_duration(previous);
00176        if( !assembly.propagate() ) {
00177          debugMsg("trex:sync", "Unable to terminate past observation "
00178                  <<obs->toString());
00179          m_reactor.log("ERROR")<<"Failed to terminate "
00180                             <<i->first->getName().toString()<<'.'
00181                             <<i->second->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString();
00182          return false;
00183        }
00184        m_terminated.insert(previous);
00185        debugMsg("trex:sync", "Terminating external obs "
00186                <<previous->toString());
00187        if( previous->isMerged() ) {
00188          EUROPA::TokenId active = previous->getActiveToken();
00189          force_update(active, previous);
00190          previous = active;
00191        } else if( !previous->isActive() )
00192          previous = EUROPA::TokenId::noId();
00193       }
00194       
00195       // Find where the new observations belong
00196       seq_iter pos, last;
00197       boost::tie(pos, last) = find_after(i->first, cur);
00198       
00199       if( last!=pos && previous==*pos )
00200        ++pos;
00201 
00202       if( last!=pos ) {
00203        // Now lets see if I can merge it with the successor of prev
00204        std::vector<EUROPA::TokenId> cands;
00205        assembly.plan_db()->getCompatibleTokens(obs, cands,
00206                                           UINT_MAX,
00207                                           true);
00208        if( cands.size()==1 ) {
00209          debugMsg("trex:sync", "Merge observation "
00210                  <<obs->toString()<<" with "<<cands[0]->toString());
00211          obs->merge(cands[0]);
00212          if( !assembly.propagate() ) {
00213            debugMsg("trex:sync", "Unable to merge new observation "
00214                    <<obs->toString()<<" with "<<cands[0]->toString());
00215            m_reactor.log("ERROR")<<"Failed to merge new observation "
00216                               <<i->first->getName().toString()<<'.'
00217                               <<i->second->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString();
00218            return false;
00219          }
00220        } else {
00221          for(std::vector<EUROPA::TokenId>::const_iterator 
00222               j=cands.begin(); cands.end()!=j; ++j) {
00223            if( *j==*pos ) {
00224              debugMsg("trex:sync", " Merge observation "
00225                      <<obs->toString()<<" with "
00226                      <<(*pos)->toString());
00227              obs->merge(*pos);
00228              if( !assembly.propagate() ) {
00229               debugMsg("trex:sync", "Unable to merge new observation "
00230                       <<obs->toString()<<" with "<<(*pos)->toString());
00231               m_reactor.log("ERROR")<<"Failed to merge new observation "
00232                                   <<i->first->getName().toString()<<'.'
00233                                   <<i->second->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString();
00234               return false;
00235              }
00236              break;
00237            }
00238          }
00239        }
00240       }      
00241 
00242       // if I could not merge it just insert it right after last obs
00243       if( !obs->isMerged() ) {
00244        obs->activate();
00245        bool inserted = false;
00246        if( previous.isId() ) {
00247          debugMsg("trex:sync", "Insert observation "
00248                  <<obs->toString()<<" after "<<previous->toString());
00249          i->first->constrain(previous, obs);
00250          inserted = true;
00251        } 
00252        if( last!=pos ) {
00253          debugMsg("trex:sync", "Insert observation "
00254                  <<obs->toString()<<" before "<<(*pos)->toString());
00255          i->first->constrain(obs, *pos);
00256          inserted = true;
00257        }
00258        if( !inserted ) {
00259          debugMsg("trex:sync", "Insert observation "
00260                  <<obs->toString()<<" in "<<i->first->toString());
00261          i->first->constrain(obs, obs);
00262        }
00263        if( !assembly.propagate() ) {
00264          debugMsg("trex:sync", "Unable to insert new observation "
00265                  <<obs->toString());
00266          m_reactor.log("ERROR")<<"Failed to insert new observation "
00267                             <<i->first->getName().toString()<<'.'
00268                             <<obs->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString();
00269          return false;
00270        }
00271        // if( obs->canBeCommitted() )
00272        //   obs->commit();
00273       }
00274       i->second = obs;
00275       // succeeded on integrating the new observation
00276       m_new_obs.erase(ni); 
00277     } else {
00278       debugMsg("trex:sync", " extend duration of "
00279               <<i->first->toString());
00280       i->second->end()->restrictBaseDomain(future);
00281       // i->second->end()->handleBase(future);
00282       enforce_duration(i->second);
00283       if( i->second->isMerged() ) {
00284          EUROPA::TokenId active = i->second->getActiveToken();
00285          force_update(active, i->second);
00286       } else {
00287        if( i->second->canBeCommitted() )
00288          i->second->commit();
00289       }
00290       
00291       if( !assembly.propagate() ) {
00292        debugMsg("trex:sync", "Unable to apply inertial value "
00293                "assumption to "<<i->second->toString());
00294        m_reactor.log("ERROR")<<"Failed to extend dutration of "
00295                            <<i->first->getName().toString()<<'.'
00296                            <<i->second->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString();
00297        return false;
00298       }
00299     }
00300   }
00301   
00302   for(i=m_new_obs.begin(); m_new_obs.end()!=i; ++i) {
00303     if( i->second.isId() ) {
00304       m_reactor.log("WARN")<<i->first->toString()<<" is not external :"
00305                         <<"\n\tdiscarding observation "
00306                         <<i->second->toString();
00307       i->second->discard();
00308     }
00309   }
00310   m_new_obs.clear();
00311   return propagate();
00312 }
00313 
00314 
00315 bool DbCore::synchronize() {
00316   size_t steps = 0;
00317   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00318 
00319     
00320 
00321   // Update the clock for the planner
00322   if( m_clk.isId() ) {
00323     m_clk->restrictBaseDomain(EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain(cur, PLUS_INFINITY));
00324   }
00325 
00326   if( update_externals() ) {
00327     if( resolve(steps) ) {
00328       if( update_internals(steps) ) {
00329        if( resolve(steps) ) {
00330          m_reactor.logPlan("sync");
00331          debugMsg("trex:sync", "SUCESS after "<<steps<<" steps.");
00332          return true;
00333        } else 
00334          debugMsg("trex:sync", "FAILED to resolve internal timelines updates");
00335       } else
00336        debugMsg("trex:sync", "FAILED to identify internal timelines state");
00337     } else
00338       debugMsg("trex:sync", "FAILED to resolve current state");
00339   } else 
00340     debugMsg("trex:sync", "FAILED to apply external state updates");
00341   m_reactor.logPlan("failed");
00342   return false;
00343 }
00344 
00345 bool DbCore::process_agenda(EUROPA::TokenSet agenda, size_t &steps) {
00346   // TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00347   Assembly &assembly = m_reactor.assembly();
00348 
00349   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=agenda.begin(); agenda.end()!=i; ++i) {
00350     if( (*i)->getObject()->lastDomain().isSingleton() && (*i)->isInactive() ) {
00351       EUROPA::TokenId cand;
00352             if( assembly.in_synch_scope(*i, cand) ) {
00353        debugMsg("trex:agenda", "resolving "<<(*i)->toLongString());
00354        ++steps;
00355        if( !( assembly.resolve(*i, cand, steps) && propagate() ) ) {
00356          debugMsg("trex:agenda", "FAILED to resolve "<<(*i)->toString());
00357          return false;
00358        } else {
00359          cand = (*i);
00360          if( (*i)->isMerged() )
00361            cand = (*i)->getActiveToken();
00362          debugMsg("trex:agenda", "RESOLVED "<<cand->toLongString());
00363        }
00364       } else {
00365        debugMsg("trex:agenda", "not in sync scope "<<(*i)->toLongString());
00366       }
00367     }
00368   }
00369   return true;
00370 }
00371 
00372 bool DbCore::resolve(size_t &steps) {
00373   size_t last_count;
00374   // Loop until quiescence
00375   do {
00376     last_count = steps;   
00377     if( !propagate() )
00378       return false;
00379 
00380     // first process the facts
00381     condDebugMsg(!m_facts_agenda.empty(), "trex:sync", 
00382                m_facts_agenda.size()<<" facts in the agenda.");
00383     if( !process_agenda(m_facts_agenda, steps) ) {
00384       debugMsg("trex:sync", "Failed to resolve facts");
00385       return false;
00386     }
00387     // then process everything else
00388     condDebugMsg(!m_agenda.empty(), "trex:sync", 
00389                m_agenda.size()<<" tokens in the agenda.");
00390     if( !process_agenda(m_agenda, steps) ) {
00391       debugMsg("trex:sync", "Failed to resolve tokens");
00392       return false;
00393     }
00394   } while( last_count!=steps );
00395   return true;
00396 }
00397 
00398 bool DbCore::update_internals(size_t &steps) {
00399   Assembly &assembly = m_reactor.assembly();
00400   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00401   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain future(cur, PLUS_INFINITY);
00402   std::list<EUROPA::TokenId> new_tokens;
00403   
00404   if( assembly.invalid() )
00405     return false;
00406   for(state_map::const_iterator i=m_internals.begin(); 
00407       m_internals.end()!=i; ++i) {
00408     EUROPA::TokenId active = i->second, last_obs;
00409     seq_iter pos, last;
00410     
00411     if( i->second.isId() && i->second->isMerged() ) 
00412       active = i->second->getActiveToken();
00413     boost::tie(pos, last) = find_after(i->first, cur);
00414     if( pos!=last && (*pos)->start()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()<=cur )
00415       last_obs = *pos;
00416     else {
00417       // No observation for current tick
00418       debugMsg("trex:sync", '['<<cur<<"] setting "
00419               <<i->first->toString()<<" satte to its default.");
00420       if( !assembly.insert_default(i->first, last_obs, steps) ) {
00421        debugMsg("trex:sync", "FAILED to insert default value on "
00422                <<i->first->toString());
00423        return false;
00424       }
00425     }
00426     if( last_obs->start()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()>=cur ) {      
00427       last_obs->start()->specify(cur);
00428       if( !assembly.propagate() ) {
00429        return false;
00430       }
00431       if( last_obs!=active && active.isId() ) 
00432        active->end()->specify(cur);
00433     }
00434   }
00435   return propagate();
00436 }
00437 
00438 bool DbCore::remove_goal(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok, bool doRestrict) {
00439   if( m_goals.erase(tok) ) {
00440     if( doRestrict ) {
00441       tok->restrictBaseDomains();
00442       // enforce_duration(tok);
00443     }
00444     m_reactor.removed(tok);
00445     return true;
00446   }
00447   return false;
00448 }
00449 
00450 
00451 bool DbCore::reset_goal(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok, bool aggressive) {
00452   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00453   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain future(cur, PLUS_INFINITY);
00454   EUROPA::TokenId active = (tok->isMerged()?tok->getActiveToken():tok);
00455   
00456   if( active->end()->baseDomain().getUpperBound()<cur ) {
00457     debugMsg("trex:relax", "DISCARD completed goal "<<tok->toString()
00458             <<": "<<tok->getPredicateName().toString());
00459     return true;
00460   }
00461   if( tok->start()->baseDomain().getUpperBound()<=cur ) {
00462     if( aggressive ) {
00463       debugMsg("trex:relax", "DISCARD goal started  in the past "<<tok->toString()
00464               <<": "<<tok->getPredicateName().toString());
00465       return true;
00466     }
00467   }
00468   
00469   return false;
00470 }
00471 
00472 bool DbCore::relax(bool aggressive) {
00473   Assembly &assembly = m_reactor.assembly();  
00474 
00475   m_reactor.log("core")<<"Beginning database relax"
00476                      <<(aggressive?" and forget about the past":"");
00477   debugMsg("trex:relax", "START "<<(aggressive?"aggressive ":"")<<"relax");
00478   // recall all of my former objectives
00479   m_reactor.relax();
00480   // Put the solver out of the way 
00481   assembly.solver().clear();
00482   assembly.mark_inactive();
00483 
00484   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00485   
00486   // First pass : deal with facts produced by TREX
00487 
00488   debugMsg("trex:relax", "evaluating "<<m_observations.size()
00489           <<" observations for relax")
00490   EUROPA::TokenSet relax_list = m_observations;
00491   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=relax_list.begin(); 
00492       relax_list.end()!=i; ++i) {
00493     if( aggressive && (*i)->end()->baseDomain().getUpperBound()<=cur ) {
00494        debugMsg("trex:relax", "DISCARD past fact "<<(*i)->toString()
00495                <<(*i)->getPredicateName().toString());
00496        (*i)->discard();     
00497     } else if( (*i)->isCommitted() ) {
00498       debugMsg("trex:relax", "Canceling slaves of "<<(*i)->toString());
00499 
00500       for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator it=(*i)->slaves().begin();
00501          (*i)->slaves().end()!=it; ++it) 
00502        if( (*it)->isClosed() && !(*it)->isInactive() ) {
00503          debugMsg("trex:relax", "\t cancel "<<(*it)->toString());
00504          (*it)->cancel();
00505        }
00506          
00507     } else if( !(*i)->isInactive() ) {
00508       debugMsg("trex:relax", "Canceling token "<<(*i)->toString());
00509       (*i)->cancel();
00510     }
00511   }
00512 
00513   debugMsg("trex:relax", "evaluating "<<m_goals.size()
00514           <<" goals for relax")
00515   // Second pass : deal with the goals 
00516   relax_list = m_goals;
00517   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=relax_list.begin(); 
00518       relax_list.end()!=i; ++i) 
00519     if( reset_goal(*i, aggressive) ) 
00520       (*i)->discard();
00521     else {
00522       // Make sure that the domain is fully relaxed 
00523       std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId> const &vars = (*i)->getVariables();
00524       if( !(*i)->isInactive() )
00525        (*i)->cancel();
00526 
00527       for(std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId>::const_iterator v=vars.begin();
00528          vars.end()!=v; ++v) {
00529        if( (*v)->canBeSpecified() && (*v)->isSpecified() )
00530          (*v)->reset();
00531        (*v)->relax();
00532       }
00533     }
00534   debugMsg("trex:relax", "removing "<<m_recalled.size()<<" recalled tokens");
00535   // third pass get rid of recalled goals
00536   relax_list = m_recalled;
00537   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=relax_list.begin(); 
00538       relax_list.end()!=i; ++i) {
00539     debugMsg("trex:relax", "DISCARD recalled goal "<<(*i)->toString());
00540     (*i)->discard();
00541   }
00542   m_reactor.logPlan("relax");
00543   if( propagate() ) {
00544     debugMsg("trex:relax", "SUCCESS");
00545     return true;
00546   } else {
00547     debugMsg("trex:relax", "FAILED");
00548     return false;
00549   }
00550 }
00551 
00552 bool DbCore::step() {
00553   Assembly &assembly = m_reactor.assembly();
00554 
00555   debugMsg("trex:step", '['<<m_reactor.getCurrentTick()<<"] START deliberation step");
00556   
00557   if( propagate() ) {
00558     DbSolver &solver = assembly.solver();
00559     
00560     if( assembly.inactive() ) 
00561       assembly.mark_active();
00562     solver.step();
00563     m_reactor.logPlan("step");
00564     debugMsg("trex:step", '['<<m_reactor.getCurrentTick()<<"] step done.");
00565     process_pending();
00566     if( solver.noMoreFlaws() ) {      
00567       debugMsg("trex:step", "No more flaws");
00568       m_reactor.end_deliberation();
00569     } else {
00570       debugMsg("trex:step", "Plan is not complete yet.");
00571     }
00572     return true;
00573   } else {
00574     debugMsg("trex:step", "Failed to propagate.");
00575     return false;
00576   }
00577 }
00578 
00579 void DbCore::doDispatch() {
00580   EUROPA::DbClientId cli = m_reactor.assembly().plan_db()->getClient();
00581 
00582   // todo add a notion of guards to avoid to dispatch too early
00583   for( state_map::const_iterator i=m_externals.begin();
00584        m_externals.end()!=i; ++i) {
00585     TICK from, to;
00586     if( m_reactor.dispatch_window(i->first, from, to) ) {
00587       seq_iter it, last;
00588       boost::tie(it, last) = find_after(i->first, from);
00589 
00590       // skipp the tokens that are necessarily before from 
00591       for( ;last!=it && (*it)->start()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()<from; ++it);
00592 
00593       // now dispatch tokens that can start before to 
00594       // and are not part of deliberation
00595       for( ;last!=it && (*it)->start()->lastDomain().getLowerBound()<to; ++it)
00596        if( !m_reactor.assembly().in_deliberation(*it) ) {
00597          // // to be safe just put it in a new token 
00598          // EUROPA::TokenId 
00599          //   requested = cli->createToken((*it)->getPredicateName().c_str(),
00600          //                         NULL, false, false);
00601          // cli->merge(requested, (*it));
00602          m_reactor.request(i->first, *it);
00603          debugMsg("trex:token:state", '['<<m_reactor.getCurrentTick()
00604                  <<"] REQUESTED "<<(*it)->toString()<<": "
00605                  <<i->first->toString()<<'.'
00606                  <<(*it)->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString()
00607                  <<"\n\tstart = "<<(*it)->start()->lastDomain().toString()
00608                  <<"\n\tduration = "<<(*it)->duration()->lastDomain().toString()
00609                  <<"\n\tend = "<<(*it)->end()->lastDomain().toString());
00610        }
00611     }
00612   }
00613 }
00614 
00615 void DbCore::doNotify() {
00616   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00617   Assembly &assembly = m_reactor.assembly();
00618   EUROPA::DbClientId cli = assembly.plan_db()->getClient();
00619   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain now(cur, cur), future(cur+1, PLUS_INFINITY);
00620 
00621   // Update my internal state
00622   for(state_map::iterator i=m_internals.begin(); 
00623       m_internals.end()!=i; ++i) {
00624     seq_iter p, p_cur, last;
00625     
00626     boost::tie(p, last) = find_after(i->first, cur-1);
00627     p_cur = p;
00628     if( last!=p && (*p)->end()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()<=cur )
00629       ++p_cur;
00630     if( last==p_cur || (*p_cur)->start()->lastDomain().getLowerBound()>cur )
00631       throw EuropaException("Do not have a state for internal timeline "+
00632                          i->first->getName().toString());
00633     else if( (*p_cur)->start()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()>=cur ) {
00634       // I have a token that can start now
00635       EUROPA::TokenId 
00636        obs = cli->createToken((*p_cur)->getPredicateName().c_str(),
00637                             NULL, false, true);
00638       obs->start()->restrictBaseDomain(now);
00639       obs->end()->restrictBaseDomain(future);
00640       enforce_duration(obs);
00641       obs->getObject()->specify(i->first->getKey());
00642       
00643       obs->merge(*p_cur);
00644       force_update(*p_cur, obs);
00645       if( !assembly.propagate() ) {
00646        m_reactor.log("notify")<<"Propagation failure on new observation "
00647               <<i->first->getName().toString()<<'.'
00648               <<i->second->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString();
00649        m_reactor.logPlan("failed");
00650       }
00651       debugMsg("trex:always", "WARNING : europa does not like me to restrict the object ... I won't do it then");
00652       /*
00653        obs->getObject()->restrictBaseDomain(obs->getObject()->lastDomain());
00654       */
00655       for(std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId>::const_iterator 
00656            v=obs->parameters().begin(); obs->parameters().end()!=v; ++v) 
00657        (*v)->restrictBaseDomain((*v)->lastDomain());                
00658       m_observations.insert(obs);
00659       // terminate the previous observation
00660       if( i->second.isId() ) {
00661        i->second->end()->restrictBaseDomain(now);
00662        // i->second->end()->handleBase(now);
00663        enforce_duration(i->second);       
00664        m_terminated.insert(i->second);    
00665 
00666        // check if any goal did complete 
00667        EUROPA::TokenSet cands = (*p)->getMergedTokens();
00668        if( (*p)!=i->second ) {
00669          cands.erase(i->second);
00670          cands.insert(*p);
00671        }
00672        for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator it=cands.begin();
00673            cands.end()!=it; ++it) {
00674          // We assume that if a goal token is completed then
00675          // the goal itself is completed
00676          // - note formally it is not necessarily true as this
00677          //   goal may depend on future tokens. To check that
00678          //   I need to se iff this token is the master of a token
00679          //   that is yet to be completed... this could be checked
00680          //   in the future but for now lets try to be efficient 
00681          //   instead
00682          remove_goal(*it);  
00683        }
00684       }
00685       i->second = obs; 
00686       m_reactor.notify(i->first, obs);
00687     } else {
00688       i->second->end()->restrictBaseDomain(future);
00689       // i->second->end()->handleBase(future);
00690       enforce_duration(i->second);
00691       if( i->second->isMerged() ) {
00692        EUROPA::TokenId active = i->second->getActiveToken();
00693        force_update(active, i->second);
00694        if( !assembly.propagate() ) {
00695          m_reactor.log("notify")<<"Propagation failure on old observation "
00696                        <<i->first->getName().toString()<<'.'
00697                        <<i->second->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString();
00698          m_reactor.logPlan("failed");
00699        }
00700       } else if( i->second->canBeCommitted() )
00701        i->second->commit();
00702     }
00703   }
00704   m_reactor.logPlan("notify");
00705 }
00706 
00707 void DbCore::recall(EUROPA::eint const &key) {
00708   EUROPA::EntityId entity = EUROPA::Entity::getEntity(key);
00709   
00710   if( entity.isId() && EUROPA::TokenId::convertable(entity) ) {
00711     EUROPA::TokenId goal(entity);
00712     
00713     if( m_goals.erase(goal) ) 
00714       m_recalled.insert(goal);
00715   }
00716 }
00717 
00718 bool DbCore::propagate() {
00719   if( m_reactor.assembly().propagate() ) {
00720     process_pending();
00721     return true;
00722   }
00723   debugMsg("trex:core", "Failed to propagate");
00724   return false;
00725 }
00726 
00727 void DbCore::process_pending() {
00728   EUROPA::TokenSet pending;
00729   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain scope(m_reactor.getInitialTick(),
00730                               m_reactor.getFinalTick());
00731   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00732   
00733   std::swap(pending, m_pending);
00734   condDebugMsg(!pending.empty(), "trex:pending", '['<<cur<<"] "
00735               <<pending.size()<<" pending tokens");
00736   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=pending.begin(); 
00737       pending.end()!=i; ++i) {
00738     if( m_reactor.assembly().ignored(*i) ) {
00739       debugMsg("trex:token", '['<<cur<<"] IGNORE "<<(*i)->toString()
00740               <<": "<<(*i)->getPredicateName().toString());
00741     } else {
00742       EUROPA::TokenId master = (*i)->master();
00743       
00744       if( master.isNoId() ) {
00745        if( (*i)->getState()->baseDomain().isMember(EUROPA::Token::REJECTED) ) {
00746          m_goals.insert(*i);
00747          // A new goal necessarily starts during the mission 
00748          (*i)->start()->restrictBaseDomain(scope);
00749          // (*i)->start()->handleBase(scope);
00750          enforce_duration(*i);
00751          propagate();
00752          debugMsg("trex:token", '['<<cur<<"] GOAL "<<(*i)->toString()
00753                  <<": "<<(*i)->getPredicateName().toString());
00754        }
00755       }
00756       if( (*i)->isFact() ) {
00757        debugMsg("trex:token", '['<<cur<<"] FACT "<<(*i)->toString()
00758                <<": "<<(*i)->getPredicateName().toString());
00759       }
00760       if( (*i)->isInactive() ) {
00761        debugMsg("trex:token", '['<<cur<<"] added "<<(*i)->toString()
00762                <<": "<<(*i)->getPredicateName().toString()<<" to agenda");
00763        add_to_agenda(*i);
00764       }
00765     }
00766   }
00767 }
00768 
00769 void DbCore::add_to_agenda(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00770   m_pending.erase(token);
00771   if( token->isFact() ) 
00772     m_facts_agenda.insert(token);
00773   else 
00774     m_agenda.insert(token);
00775 }
00776 
00777 void DbCore::remove_from_agenda(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00778   if( token->isFact() ) 
00779     m_facts_agenda.erase(token);
00780   else 
00781     m_agenda.erase(token);
00782 }
00783 
00784 void DbCore::remove_observation(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) {
00785   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00786 
00787   if( m_observations.erase(tok) &&
00788       tok->end()->getUpperBound()>=cur ) {
00789     EUROPA::ObjectDomain const &domain=tok->getObject()->baseDomain();
00790     EUROPA::ObjectId object = domain.getObject(domain.getSingletonValue());
00791     state_map::iterator i = m_internals.find(object);
00792     if( m_internals.end()!=i ) {
00793       if( tok==i->second )
00794        i->second = EUROPA::TokenId::noId();
00795     } else {
00796       i = m_externals.find(tok);
00797       if( m_externals.end()!=i &&
00798          tok==i->second ) 
00799        i->second = EUROPA::TokenId::noId();
00800     }
00801   }
00802 }
00803 
00804 void DbCore::archive() {
00805   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00806   Assembly &assembly = m_reactor.assembly();
00807 
00808   if( assembly.inactive() ) {
00809     EUROPA::TokenSet terminated = m_terminated, removed;
00810     
00811     condDebugMsg(!terminated.empty(), "trex:archive", 
00812                "Evaluating "<<terminated.size()<<" facts for archiving.");
00813     for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=terminated.begin();
00814        terminated.end()!=i; ++i) {
00815       EUROPA::TokenId token = *i;
00816 
00817       if( token->isInactive() ) {
00818        debugMsg("trex:archive", "DISCARD inactive "<<token->toString());
00819        removed.insert(token);
00820       } else {
00821        if( token->isMerged() ) {
00822          EUROPA::TokenId active = token->getActiveToken();
00823          debugMsg("trex:archive", "REPLACE merged "<<token->toString()
00824                  <<" by "<<active->toString());
00825          if( token->isFact() )
00826            active->makeFact();
00827          removed.insert(token);
00828          token = active;
00829        } else {
00830          token->restrictBaseDomains();
00831          // enforce_duration(token);
00832        }
00833        // here token is necessarily the active one
00834        EUROPA::TokenSet tokens = token->getMergedTokens();
00835        for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator it=tokens.begin();
00836            tokens.end()!=it; ++it) {
00837          if( remove_goal(*it, false) ) {
00838            force_update(token, *it);
00839            debugMsg("trex:archive", "DISCARD merged "<<(*it)->toString());
00840            removed.insert(token);
00841          }
00842        }
00843        token->restrictBaseDomains();
00844        // Now that I did a lot of cleaning I can try to terminate this guy
00845        if( token->canBeTerminated(cur) )
00846          token->terminate();
00847 
00848        // This part proved to be problematic as it can relax my plan ...
00849        //   - need to improve it so it won't mess up my plan
00850        tokens = token->slaves();
00851        bool can_discard = token->isTerminated();
00852        for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator it=tokens.begin();
00853            tokens.end()!=it; ++it) {
00854          if( (*it)->isInactive() ) {
00855            if( assembly.ignored(*it) ) {
00856              debugMsg("trex:archive", "DISCARD ignored "<<(*it)->toString());
00857            } else 
00858              can_discard = false;
00859          } else 
00860            can_discard = false;
00861              
00862          // if( (*it)->isInactive() ) {
00863          //   if( (*it)->end()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()<=cur ) {
00864          //     debugMsg("trex:archive", "REMOVE inactive slave "<<(*it)->toString());
00865          //     removed.insert(*i);
00866          //   } else 
00867          //     can_discard = false;
00868          // } else {
00869          //   EUROPA::TokenId active = (*it);
00870          //   if( active->isMerged() ) {
00871          //     active = active->getActiveToken();
00872          //   }
00873          //   if( active->start()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()<=cur ) {
00874          //     if( active->canBeCommitted() )
00875          //   active->commit();
00876          //     if( active->end()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()<=cur ) {
00877          //   active->start()->restrictBaseDomain(active->start()->lastDomain());
00878          //   active->end()->restrictBaseDomain(active->end()->lastDomain());
00879          //          active->restrictBaseDomains();
00880          //          enforce_duration(active);
00881          //          m_terminated.insert(active);
00882          //   debugMsg("trex:archive", "DISCONNECT "<<(*it)->toString()
00883          //           <<" form master "<<token->toString());
00884          //   (*it)->removeMaster(token);
00885          //     } else 
00886          //   can_discard = false;
00887          //   } else 
00888          //     can_discard = false;             
00889          //}
00890        }
00891        if( can_discard ) {
00892          debugMsg("trex:archive", "REMOVE unused fact "<<token->toString());
00893          removed.insert(token);
00894        }
00895       }
00896     }
00897     // Now deal with recalled goals
00898     terminated = m_recalled;
00899     for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=terminated.begin(); 
00900        terminated.end()!=i; ++i) {
00901       if( !(*i)->isActive() ) {
00902        debugMsg("trex:archive", "DISCARD recalled goal "<<(*i)->toString());
00903        removed.insert(*i);
00904       }
00905     }
00906     condDebugMsg(!removed.empty(), "trex:archive", 
00907                "Archiving "<<removed.size()<<" tokens");
00908     for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=removed.begin();
00909        removed.end()!=i; ++i) {
00910       EUROPA::TokenId active = EUROPA::TokenId::noId(); 
00911 
00912       if( (*i)->isMerged() ) {
00913        active = (*i)->getActiveToken();
00914       }
00915       (*i)->discard();
00916       if( active.isId() && !active->isFact() ) {
00917        EUROPA::TokenSet const &slaves = active->slaves();
00918        for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator j=slaves.begin();
00919            slaves.end()!=j; ++j) 
00920          if( (*j)->isFact() )
00921            force_update(active, *j);
00922       }
00923     }
00924     m_reactor.logPlan("archive"); 
00925   }
00926 }
00927 
00928 void DbCore::enforce_duration(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) {
00929   EUROPA::edouble start_lb, start_ub, end_lb, end_ub, d_lb, d_ub;
00930   tok->start()->baseDomain().getBounds(start_lb, start_ub);
00931   tok->end()->baseDomain().getBounds(end_lb, end_ub);
00932 
00933   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain dur = tok->duration()->baseDomain();
00934   if( dur.intersect(end_lb-start_ub, end_ub-start_lb) ) {
00935     tok->duration()->restrictBaseDomain(dur);
00936     // tok->duration()->handleBase(dur);
00937   }
00938 }
00939 
00940 void DbCore::force_update(EUROPA::TokenId const &active, EUROPA::TokenId const &merged) {
00941   active->start()->handleBase(merged->start()->baseDomain());
00942   active->duration()->handleBase(merged->duration()->baseDomain());
00943   active->end()->handleBase(merged->end()->baseDomain());
00944 
00945   std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId> const &attr = active->parameters();
00946   for(std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId>::const_iterator i=attr.begin();
00947       attr.end()!=i; ++i) 
00948     merged->getVariable((*i)->getName())->handleBase((*i)->lastDomain());
00949 }

00954 void DbCore::notifyAdded(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00955   debugMsg("trex:token:state", "ADD "<<token->toString()
00956           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
00957   m_pending.insert(token);
00958 }
00959 
00960 void DbCore::notifyRemoved(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00961   debugMsg("trex:token:state", "REMOVE "<<token->toString()
00962           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
00963   m_pending.erase(token);
00964   remove_from_agenda(token);
00965   remove_goal(token, false);
00966   remove_observation(token);
00967   m_terminated.erase(token);
00968   m_recalled.erase(token);
00969 }
00970 
00971 void DbCore::notifyActivated(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00972   debugMsg("trex:token:state", "ACTIVE "<<token->toString()
00973           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
00974   remove_from_agenda(token);
00975 }
00976 
00977 void DbCore::notifyDeactivated(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00978   debugMsg("trex:token:state", "INACTIVE "<<token->toString()
00979           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
00980   add_to_agenda(token);
00981 }
00982 
00983 void DbCore::notifyMerged(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00984   debugMsg("trex:token:state", "MERGE "<<token->toString()
00985           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
00986   remove_from_agenda(token);
00987   force_update(token->getActiveToken(), token);  
00988 }
00989 
00990 void DbCore::notifySplit(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00991   debugMsg("trex:token:state", "SPLIT "<<token->toString()
00992           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
00993   add_to_agenda(token);
00994 }
00995 
00996 void DbCore::notifyCommitted(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00997   debugMsg("trex:token:state", "COMMIT "<<token->toString()
00998           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
00999 }
01000 
01001 void DbCore::notifyRejected(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
01002   debugMsg("trex:token:state", "REJECT "<<token->toString()
01003           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
01004   remove_from_agenda(token);
01005 }
01006 
01007 void DbCore::notifyTerminated(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
01008   debugMsg("trex:token:state", "TERMINATE "<<token->toString()
01009           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
01010   remove_from_agenda(token);
01011   m_terminated.insert(token);
01012 }
